title: Business center, Pet Stations, WiFi Available, Fully Equipped Kitchen
posting_body: ['Capri North and South Apartments in Las Vegas, NV', 'Capri North and South Apartments are a beautiful, pet-friendly community that offers one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'These spacious residences feature fireplaces, oversized garden tubs, large walk-in closets, washers and dryers and covered parking.', 'Take advantage of our community amenities by relaxing in our resort-style swimming pool or getting in a good workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'Capri North and South are conveniently located near I-95 and Sunset Park and is minutes away from McCarran International Airport, UNLV, and other dining and shopping areas.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 105', 'OR Text', '105', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Walk in Closets', '- Digital Cable and Internet Included in Every Unit', '- Washer Dryer in Unit', 'Community Amenities', '- WiFi Available', '- Gated Access', '- Pet Stations', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Professional Management', '- 24-hour Maintenance', '- Business center', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- Dog Park', '- BBQ grills', '- Spa', '- Resort Style Swimming Pool', '- Fitness Center', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Capri', '3295 Casey Drive , Las Vegas, NV, 89120', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'IS8Y4y0cdr6p']
